bibl.title: P. Berol. inv. 13287: Damage Caused by Cattle and Some Other Problems.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.author: Lukaszewicz, Adam

bibl.note: Reconsiders some of the instances of "ep' autophoro" in papyri, and produces a further example from P. Berol. Inv. 13287 (Fayoum, A.D. 39-40).
Lukaszewicz Adam, P. Berol. inv. 13287: Damage Caused by Cattle and Some Other Problems.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 357-360.
